content:
TITLE: Basic Text Encoding and Decoding in JavaScript
DESCRIPTION: Basic usage example showing how to encode a string to a Uint8Array and decode it back using TextEncoder and TextDecoder.
SOURCE: https://github.com/yubico/java-webauthn-server/blob/main/webauthn-server-demo/src/main/webapp/lib/text-encoding-0.7.0/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
  var uint8array = new TextEncoder().encode(string);
  var string = new TextDecoder(encoding).decode(uint8array);
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Streaming Text Decoding in JavaScript
DESCRIPTION: Example demonstrating how to perform streaming decode operations, useful for processing data chunks as they arrive.
SOURCE: https://github.com/yubico/java-webauthn-server/blob/main/webauthn-server-demo/src/main/webapp/lib/text-encoding-0.7.0/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
  var string = "", decoder = new TextDecoder(encoding), buffer;
  while (buffer = next_chunk()) {
    string += decoder.decode(buffer, {stream:true});
  }
  string += decoder.decode(); // finish the stream
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Tests for Java WebAuthn Server
DESCRIPTION: Command to clean and run all tests before creating a release. This ensures the project is in a stable state before publishing.
SOURCE: https://github.com/yubico/java-webauthn-server/blob/main/doc/releasing.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
$ ./gradlew clean check
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Adding Text Encoding to HTML Page
DESCRIPTION: HTML code showing how to include the text-encoding library in a web page. The encoding-indexes.js file is required for non-UTF encodings.
SOURCE: https://github.com/yubico/java-webauthn-server/blob/main/webauthn-server-demo/src/main/webapp/lib/text-encoding-0.7.0/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: html
CODE:
```
  <!-- Required for non-UTF encodings -->
  <script src="encoding-indexes.js"></script>
  <script src="encoding.js"></script>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Publishing to Sonatype Nexus Repository
DESCRIPTION: Gradle command to publish the library to Sonatype Nexus and automatically close and release the staging repository. This makes the library available in Maven Central.
SOURCE: https://github.com/yubico/java-webauthn-server/blob/main/doc/releasing.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
$ ./gradlew publishToSonatype closeAndReleaseSonatypeStagingRepository
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Text Encoding with npm in Node.js
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the text-encoding library using npm package manager in a Node.js environment.
SOURCE: https://github.com/yubico/java-webauthn-server/blob/main/webauthn-server-demo/src/main/webapp/lib/text-encoding-0.7.0/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
npm install text-encoding
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Sonatype Nexus Publishing Properties
DESCRIPTION: Configuration settings for publishing to Maven Central via Sonatype Nexus. These properties should be added to $HOME/.gradle/gradle.properties and include the user token credentials for authentication.
SOURCE: https://github.com/yubico/java-webauthn-server/blob/main/doc/development.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: properties
CODE:
```
yubicoPublish=true
ossrhUsername=8pnmjKQP
ossrhPassword=bmjuyWSIik8P3Nq/ZM2G0Xs0sHEKBg+4q4zTZ8JDDRCr
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Tagging a Final Release
DESCRIPTION: Git command for creating a signed, annotated tag for a final release version. This marks the specific commit for the stable release.
SOURCE: https://github.com/yubico/java-webauthn-server/blob/main/doc/releasing.md#2025-04-23_snippet_9

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
$ git tag -a -s 1.4.0 -m "Release 1.4.0"
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Pushing Final Release to GitHub
DESCRIPTION: Git command to push the main branch and the release tag to GitHub, making the final release available in the repository.
SOURCE: https://github.com/yubico/java-webauthn-server/blob/main/doc/releasing.md#2025-04-23_snippet_10

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
$ git push origin main 1.4.0
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Tagging a Release Candidate
DESCRIPTION: Git command for creating a signed, annotated tag for a release candidate version. This marks the specific commit for the pre-release.
SOURCE: https://github.com/yubico/java-webauthn-server/blob/main/doc/releasing.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
$ git tag -a -s 1.4.0-RC1 -m "Pre-release 1.4.0-RC1"
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Updating Java Version in GitHub Workflow Configuration
DESCRIPTION: Example YAML configuration showing how to update the Java version in the release verification workflow to match the current development environment.
SOURCE: https://github.com/yubico/java-webauthn-server/blob/main/doc/releasing.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: yaml
CODE:
```
strategy:
  matrix:
    java: ["17.0.7"]
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Forcing the TextEncoder Polyfill in Browsers
DESCRIPTION: Script to force browsers to use the polyfill implementation by nullifying any native TextEncoder and TextDecoder implementations.
SOURCE: https://github.com/yubico/java-webauthn-server/blob/main/webauthn-server-demo/src/main/webapp/lib/text-encoding-0.7.0/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: html
CODE:
```
<script>
window.TextEncoder = window.TextDecoder = null;
</script>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Completing the Merge and Cleanup for Release
DESCRIPTION: Git commands to finalize the merge back to main and clean up the temporary release branch after the merge commit has been prepared.
SOURCE: https://github.com/yubico/java-webauthn-server/blob/main/doc/releasing.md#2025-04-23_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
$ git checkout main
$ git merge --ff-only release-1.4.0
$ git branch -d release-1.4.0
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Non-Standard Legacy Encoding in JavaScript
DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to enable non-standard behavior to encode text using legacy encodings like windows-1252, which is not supported in the standard specification.
SOURCE: https://github.com/yubico/java-webauthn-server/blob/main/webauthn-server-demo/src/main/webapp/lib/text-encoding-0.7.0/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
var uint8array = new TextEncoder(
  'windows-1252', { NONSTANDARD_allowLegacyEncoding: true }).encode(text);
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Amending Release Documentation Changes
DESCRIPTION: Git commands to stage documentation updates and amend them to the merge commit, ensuring all release-related changes are in a single commit.
SOURCE: https://github.com/yubico/java-webauthn-server/blob/main/doc/releasing.md#2025-04-23_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
$ git add NEWS README */README .github/workflows/release-verify-signatures.yml
$ git commit --amend --reset-author
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Pushing Release Candidate to GitHub on Main Branch
DESCRIPTION: Git command to push a release candidate tag to the main branch when README changes accurately reflect the latest non-pre-release version.
SOURCE: https://github.com/yubico/java-webauthn-server/blob/main/doc/releasing.md#2025-04-23_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
$ git push origin main 1.4.0-RC1
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating a No-Fast-Forward Merge for Release
DESCRIPTION: Git commands to create a no-fast-forward merge from the last release to the new release commit. This preserves the complete release history in the git graph.
SOURCE: https://github.com/yubico/java-webauthn-server/blob/main/doc/releasing.md#2025-04-23_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
$ git checkout 1.3.0
$ git checkout -b release-1.4.0
$ git merge --no-ff main
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Pushing Release Candidate to GitHub on a Branch
DESCRIPTION: Git commands to create and push a release branch when making significant README changes in a pre-release that shouldn't yet reflect the main branch.
SOURCE: https://github.com/yubico/java-webauthn-server/blob/main/doc/releasing.md#2025-04-23_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
$ git checkout -b release-1.4.0
$ git push origin release-1.4.0 1.4.0-RC1
```
